backend/main.mo: Defines a canister with two persistent maps storing report counts and exposes read‑only query methods for phone and crypto lookups.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries describing required pages, routing updates, multilingual content, and associated files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten short summaries for numerous frontend files used for build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining OKLCH color tokens and dark‑mode values for global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, icons, manifest, and mounting the React root.
frontend/PHASE3A_READONLY_FRONTEND_NOCHA: Documentation confirming no frontend changes are required for Phase 3a and explaining why the new read‑only canister is not yet integrated.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining name, icons, start URL, theme colors, and display configuration.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing caching, app shell routing, and network‑first fetch handling for offline support.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring providers, setting document title, and routing to mission, how‑it‑works, terms, privacy, or home with legacy path normalization.
frontend/src/backend.idl.ts: Candid IDL definition exposing only the analyzeText method for the backend canister.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Shared layout rendering header, navigation, mobile menu, language selector, auth controls, and wrapping page content.
frontend/src/components/AuthControl.tsx: Handles login via Internet Identity and shows a profile dropdown when authenticated.
frontend/src/components/CollaborativeRes: Displays collaborative lookup results with risk score, categories, and error or empty states.
frontend/src/components/DashboardQuickAc: Provides quick‑action buttons for checking risk, searching the database, reporting scams, and installing the PWA.
frontend/src/components/LanguageSelector: Offers a dropdown for selecting the app language from predefined options.
frontend/src/components/PwaInstallAction: Shows an install button or instructions for adding the PWA depending on installability and platform.
frontend/src/components/ReportSubmission: Renders a dialog for submitting scam reports with validation, rate‑limit checks, and success handling.
Shows user principal info, search history with clearing options, and a logout button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the authenticated identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAntiFraudActors.ts: Initializes and manages multiple anti‑fraud actors, logging readiness once and exposing fetch state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, loading stored identities, and handling login state. Wraps Dfinity AuthClient setup and exposes login, clear, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstall.ts: Detects PWA installability, tracks installation state, and exposes methods to trigger install prompts and fetch platform-specific instructions. Listens for beforeinstallprompt and appinstalled events.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Loads and stores per-identity user history in local storage and exposes methods to add or clear history entries. Reactively updates history when the authenticated identity changes.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Implements a language context storing the selected language in sessionStorage and providing translation access. Exposes setLanguage and the active language's translation map.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Defines the Portuguese translation dictionary used by the i18n system for UI text. Maps keys for navigation, actions, errors, results, and other labels.
frontend/src/ic/actors.ts: Creates Dfinity HTTP agents and typed actors for main, extra, and reports canisters using fixed mainnet host. Provides helper functions to instantiate each canister interface.
frontend/src/ic/canisterIds.ts: Centralizes canister IDs for main, extra, and reports services and exposes a helper to fetch IDs by type. Serves as the canonical source for all canister identifiers.
frontend/src/ic/idl/extra.idl.ts: Defines Candid interface for the extra canister with phone and crypto report queries. Exports TypeScript interface for corresponding actor methods.
frontend/src/ic/idl/main.idl.ts: Defines Candid interface for the main canister exposing a text analysis method. Provides the matching TypeScript interface for the actor.
frontend/src/ic/idl/reports.idl.ts: Defines Candid types and service for submitting and looking up fraud reports across several categories. Exports TypeScript interfaces for requests, results, and actor methods.
frontend/src/ic/readinessReport.ts: Generates a readiness summary showing available actors and implemented methods for all canisters and logs a formatted report to console. Used to verify canister connectivity and API surface.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light/dark themes plus accessibility and mobile touch-target adjustments.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements the main user dashboard for analyzing messages and checking email, phone, and crypto data using backend actors.
frontend/src/pages/HowItWorksPage.tsx: Displays an informational page with SEO setup and accordion-based explanations of verification types.
frontend/src/pages/InstitutionalMissionP: Renders a mission and values page with vision, mission, and value sections sourced from translations.
frontend/src/pages/InstitutionalPage.tsx: Provides an institutional overview with feature summaries and a detailed accordion explaining workflow steps.
frontend/src/pages/MissionPage.tsx: Shows a mission-focused informational page with vision, core mission, impact, values, and system limitations sections.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPage.tsx: Renders the Privacy Policy page using i18n content and sets SEO metadata, displaying multiple sections from translated text arrays.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Renders the Terms of Service page with i18n-driven section content and sets SEO metadata similarly to the privacy page.
frontend/src/router/useSimpleRouter.ts: Implements a minimal client-side router using window history, custom navigation events, and a React hook to track the current route.
frontend/src/utils/emailHeuristics.ts: Provides deterministic email risk analysis by checking domains, TLDs, patterns, and formatting to categorize emails as safe or flagged.
frontend/src/utils/localRateLimit.ts: Implements a localStorage-based cooldown system to rate-limit actions, returning allowance status and managing timestamps.
frontend/src/utils/messageHeuristics.ts: Analyzes text for scam indicators using keyword weights, URL and crypto detection, punctuation checks, and assigns a risk score.
frontend/src/utils/seo.ts: Sets document title and meta description for SPA routes with AntiFraud branding.
frontend/src/utils/translateBackendResul: Performs simple dictionary-based translation of backend scam analysis text into multiple languages by replacing known terms.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and optionally clean them from the URL.
frontend/src/utils/userProfileStorage.ts: Manages per‑user profiles in localStorage, storing history items and preferences with load, save, and clear utilities.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and container settings with custom CSS variables and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, scope, branding rules, required pages, PWA requirements, canister integration notes, and known issues.
